segments.text: Really ! I've never seen so much work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right.How are you going to spend your weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . I have no idea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to play some tennis with me before going home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not good at sports , I have never played tennis , and I know I would be terrible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should try it.It ' s a great game . Come on , let me help you . I'm a good player , and a good teacher , too.What do you say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , but don't say I didn't warn you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was a pretty good shot , Mary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me help you with your serve .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No one has ever tried to show me how to play a sport before.Maybe I should learn to do something .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , you can.All you need is a little help and a lot of practice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you really think I can be a good player ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , maybe not a Michael Zhang , but better than the average . Person would you like to play again Wednesday ?
segments.speaker: S1
